000048.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times Co.,Ltd
000048.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times Co., Ltd. engages in the farming, feed, and agricultural products businesses in China. The company is involved in the breeding and sale of pigs, broilers, porks, eggs, other fresh agricultural and feed products, chickens, ducks, and fishes. It also provides transportation, water supply, real estate development, property management, and financial investment services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Kondarl (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times Co., Ltd. in April 2020. Shenzhen Kingkey Smart Agriculture Times Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

000529.SZ.summary: Guangdong Guanghong Holdings Co., Ltd. primarily supplies meat food in China. It also publishes and sells primary/middle school textbooks through 60 train stores. The company offers its meat products through frozen food store and frozen food distribution center. Guangdong Guanghong Holdings Co., Ltd. is based in Guangzhou, China.

000702.SZ.long_name: Hunan Zhenghong Science and Technology Develop Co.,Ltd.
000702.SZ.summary: Hunan Zhenghong Science and Technology Develop Co.,Ltd. researches, produces, and sells feed products under the Zhenghong brand in China. The company offers a series of feed products primarily for pigs, chickens, ducks, fishes, cattle, and sheep. It is also involved in pig breeding, meat processing, biological veterinary drugs manufacturing, and import and export trade businesses. The company sells its products to Hunan, Hubei, Henan, Hebei, Anhui, Jiangsu, Shandong, Jilin, and other provinces. The company is based in Yueyang, China.

000713.SZ.summary: Hefei Fengle Seed Co., Ltd engages in the development, production, and sale of seeds, agrochemicals, and perfumes in China. It provides rice, corn, watermelon, melon, vegetable, and green manure seeds, as well as agri-products. The company was formerly known as Hefei Seed Company. Hefei Fengle Seed Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Hefei, China.

000735.SZ.summary: Luoniushan Co., Ltd. engages in the animal husbandry and real estate businesses in China. The company is involved in pig breeding and sales, commercial pig production, feed supply, pig epidemic prevention, livestock slaughtering and processing, environmental protection and utilization, scientific research promotion, food quarantine, etc., as well as provision of cold chain logistics services. It also develops and constructs residential real estate projects; operates vocational and technical colleges, as well as primary, junior high, high, and tertiary education schools; provides accommodation and catering, and sporadic training and examination services; and offers loans to small and medium-sized enterprises, and merchants. The company was formerly known as Haikou Agriculture & Industry & Trade (Luoniushan) Co Ltd and changed its name to Luoniushan Co., Ltd. in July 2013. Luoniushan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Haikou City, China.

000876.SZ.summary: New Hope Liuhe Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in feed, breeding, meat products, and financial investment businesses in China, Vietnam, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Sri Lanka, Kampuchea, Singapore, Egypt, and internationally. It offers meat products, such as smoked duck breast and roasted duck legs; and other products. The company also provides ham sausages under the Meihao brand; poultry feed and pig feed under the Liuhe brand; poultry feed and aquatic feed under the Guoxiong and Jiahao brand names; and chilled fresh pork under the Qianxihe brand. In addition, it offers financial guarantee services for farmers. The company was formerly known as Sichuan New Hope Agribusiness Co., Ltd. New Hope Liuhe Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002041.SZ.summary: ShanDongDenghai Seeds Co.,Ltd, an agricultural company, engages in research, breeding, and cultivation of corn, wheat, and flower seeds in China. The company is based in Laizhou, China. ShanDongDenghai Seeds Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Corteva, Inc.

002069.SZ.summary: Zoneco Group Co., Ltd. engages in breeding, harvesting, processing, and trading of seafood in China and internationally. The company's products include scallops, oysters, abalones, Boston lobsters, sea snails, sea cucumbers, crabs, shrimps, shrimp meat, garlic scallops with vermicelli, breaded squid rings, black pepper salmon, and breaded cod stecks, as well as flavored whole scallops and salmon paste, and peeled shrimps. It also offers third party cold chain logistics services, including international refrigerated cargo transit, international cargo agency, refrigerated cargo storage, refrigerated cargo city distribution, and trunk transportation. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Dalian, China.

002157.SZ.summary: Jiangxi Zhengbang Technology Co.Ltd. operates in the agricultural industry in China. The company offers rice products, feed, veterinary drugs, and pesticides. It also engages in the livestock and poultry breeding business. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Nanchang, China.

002166.SZ.summary: Guilin Layn Natural Ingredients Corp. produces plant-based sweeteners, flavors, and botanicals in China and internationally. The company offers stevia, a plant based sweetener sourced from the leaves of the plant; monk fruit extract, a plant-based sweetener sourced from a fruit; lovia; natural flavors; and functional ingredients, as well as nutraceuticals. It also provides food and beverage ingredients; and animal and pet nutrition products under the TruGro brand. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002200.SZ.long_name: Yunnan Yuntou Ecology and Environment Technology Co., Ltd.
002200.SZ.summary: Yunnan Yuntou Ecology and Environment Technology Co., Ltd. engages in green, general contracting, environmental services, and investment businesses in China. The company is involved in the provision of engineering services, including design, construction, and maintenance services; and nursery, flower cultivation, and landscape businesses. It also undertakes the construction of urban roads and environmental facilities, infrastructure projects, urban special environmental management projects, etc.; and rural and scenic ecological environment construction projects. In addition, the company offers environmental consulting, management, professional construction, and ecological repair integrated services; water supply, sewage treatment, solid waste treatment, and hazardous waste disposal services; lake watershed management and soil remediation services; and environmental monitoring and testing services. Further, it engages in fund and industrial project investment activities. The company was formerly known as Yunnan Green-Land Biological Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yunnan Yuntou Ecology and Environment Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2014. Yunnan Yuntou Ecology and Environment Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Kunming, China.

002234.SZ.long_name: Shandong Minhe Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd.
002234.SZ.summary: Shandong Minhe Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in breeding, slaughtering, and processing chicken in China and internationally. It offers chicken products, fresh and snack foods, conditioning products, and bio-organic fertilizers. The company also engages in the biogas power generation activities. Shandong Minhe Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Penglai, China.

002299.SZ.summary: Fujian Sunner Development Co., Ltd. engages in breeding, slaughtering, processing, and selling chicken in China. The company is headquartered in Nanping, China.

002321.SZ.long_name: Henan Huaying Agricultural Development Co., Ltd.
002321.SZ.summary: Henan Huaying Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. engages in the duck/chicken farming, breeding, and hatching business in China. It is involved in the duck/chicken slaughtering and processing; poultry sales; and feed production activities, as well as provision of frozen products and cooked food products. The company also provides meatballs, grilled fried, duck blood, and sauces and brines, as well as leisure products. It offers products under the Huaying brand name. The company also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions, such as Korea, Japan, Singapore, South Africa, the Middle East, and Central Asia. Henan Huaying Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Xinyang, China.

002385.SZ.summary: Beijing Dabeinong Technology Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the feed business for farmers and growers. It offers pig feeds, livestock and poultry feeds, and veterinary drug vaccines, as well as rice, corn crop, and other seed products. The company is also involved in the agricultural Internet and industrial chain technology financial services. Beijing Dabeinong Technology Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.

002458.SZ.long_name: Shandong Yisheng Livestock & Poultry Breeding Co., Ltd.
002458.SZ.summary: Shandong Yisheng Livestock & Poultry Breeding Co., Ltd. engages in livestock and poultry business in China and internationally. The company is involved in the research and sale of broiler breeders, original breeders, ancestral pigs, feed, animal husbandry and veterinary, ecological dairy farming, milk processing, commercial chicken, ecological vegetables, manure biological treatment, and organic fertilizer processing. Shandong Yisheng Livestock & Poultry Breeding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

002505.SZ.long_name: Pengdu Agriculture & Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd.
002505.SZ.summary: Pengdu Agriculture & Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd. engages in the grain trade, beef cattle, dairy, mutton sheep, food distribution, and food supply chain businesses in China and internationally. The company trades in grain and oil, soybean, corn, and other bulk agricultural products; operates dairy farms and supplies milk; breeds and produces mutton sheep; and breeds and sells pigs. It is also involved in the breeding, slaughtering, processing, and cold chain logistics, as well as import, inspection, and quarantine of beef cattle; and distribution of food. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002714.SZ.summary: Muyuan Foods Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the hog industry in China. It is also involved in feed processing, pig breeding, and commercial pig raising activities that include commercial pigs, piglets, and swine's; and slaughtering and processing, as well as pig husbandry activities. Muyuan Foods Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Nanyang, China.

002772.SZ.summary: Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of edible fungi in China. It offers mushrooms under the Xi Huang, NÃ¼wa, and Zhongxing and other brands. The company was formerly known as Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Ltd. and changed its name to Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Co.,Ltd. in March 2012. Tianshui Zhongxing Bio-technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tianshui, the People's Republic of China.

002910.SZ.summary: Lanzhou Zhuangyuan Pasture Co., Ltd. manufactures, markets, and sells dairy products in China. The company operates through two segments, Dairy Farming and Dairy Products Production. It offers liquid milk products comprising pasteurized milk, UHT temperature milk, modified milk, yogurt, and other dairy products; and milk beverage products. The company markets its products to retail chains, supermarkets, and local schools through distributors, sales agents, and direct sale. Lanzhou Zhuangyuan Pasture Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Lanzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002982.SZ.summary: Hunan Xiangjia Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd offers poultry breeding, slaughtering, and processing services. It produces poultry feed and biological fertilizers. The company also offers cold meat products, such as duck soup and intestines and chicken breast, legs, thighs, and wings. It was formerly known as Hunan Shuangjia Agriculture and Animal Husbandry Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hunan Xiangjia Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd in June, 2012. Hunan Xiangjia Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd company was founded in 1994 and is based in Changde, China.

1431.HK.summary: YuanShengTai Dairy Farm Limited, a dairy farming company, engages in the production and sale of raw milk in the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2019, it had six farms in Heilongjiang Province and one farm in Jilin Province with a total of 63,640 cows. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Qiqihar, the People's Republic of China.

1432.HK.summary: China Shengmu Organic Milk Limited, an investment holding company, produces and distributes raw milk and dairy products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Bayannur, the People's Republic of China.

1492.HK.long_name: China ZhongDi Dairy Holdings Company Limited
1492.HK.summary: China ZhongDi Dairy Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates dairy farms in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Dairy Farming Business and Import Trading Business. It raises and breeds dairy cows; produces raw milk; and sells reproduced heifers. The company is also involved in the import and sale of cows, alfalfa hay, breeding stock, and other animal husbandry-related products, as well as the provision of import agency services. As of December 31, 2019, it owned and operated eight dairy farms, including Beijing ZhongDi Farm, Inner Mongolia ZhongDi Diary, Helan ZhongDi Farm, Ningxia ZhongDi Farm, Kuandian ZhongDi Farm, Langfang ZhongDi Farm, Tianzhen ZhongDi Farm, and Tianjin ZhongDi Farm. China ZhongDi Dairy Holdings Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

1533.HK.summary: Lanzhou Zhuangyuan Pasture Co., Ltd. manufactures, markets, and sells dairy products in China. The company operates through two segments, Dairy Farming and Dairy Products Production. It offers liquid milk products comprising pasteurized milk, UHT temperature milk, modified milk, yogurt, and other dairy products; and milk beverage products. The company markets its products to retail chains, supermarkets, and local schools through distributors, sales agents, and direct sale. Lanzhou Zhuangyuan Pasture Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Lanzhou, the People's Republic of China.

1699.HK.summary: China Putian Food Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in farming and slaughtering hogs, and selling pork and commodity hog products in the People's Republic of China. The company primarily offers whole hog carcasses, heads, intestines, other internal organs, and various cuts of pork meat under the Putian brand. It also retails and wholesales pork products; wholesales pre-packaged food; organizes exhibition events; and provides technology development and consultancy services, as well as research and development services on food production technology. In addition, the company farms cereals and vegetables; and produces and sells frozen and agricultural products. As of December 31, 2019, it had 80 retail counters in supermarkets and department stores; and 14 direct sales retail outlets. The company is headquartered in Putian, the People's Republic of China. China Putian Food Holding Limited is a subsidiary of Zhan Rui Investments Limited.

2P5.F.summary: Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd., through its subsidiary, Fujian Provincial Pingtan County Ocean Fishing Group Co., Ltd., engages in the ocean fishing business. The company catches a range of fish species, such as squid, ribbon fish, croaker fish, and cuttlefish. As of December 31, 2019, it owned 41 squid jigging vessels, 26 trawlers, 25 seine vessels, 13 drifters, 4 longline fishing vessels, and 2 transport vessels, as well as had operating license rights to 20 drifters. The company serves various customers, including distributors, restaurant owners, and exporters in the People's Republic of China. Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd. has strategic cooperation agreements with World Telecom Satellite Technology Limited and Wuhan Incar Technology Limited to explore the construction of PME-Live, a high-speed information platform for pelagic fishing vessels, as well as establish PME-Track, an aquatic products production, supply, and marketing tracking management platform. The company is based in Fuzhou, the People's Republic of China.

300087.SZ.summary: Winall Hi-tech Seed Co., Ltd. engages in the breeding of various crop seeds in China. It offers two-line hybrid rice varieties; and canola, cotton, corn, wheat, pumpkin, melon, and vegetable crop seeds. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hefei, China.

300106.SZ.long_name: Xinjiang Western Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd
300106.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Western Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd provides milk products primarily in China. The company engages in the purchase and production of milk; breeding of cattle; and feedstuff business. It is also involved in harvesting grass; the provision of machine harvesting services; and other activities. The company is based in Shihezi, China.

300138.SZ.summary: ChenGuang Biotech Group Co., Ltd. engages in the processing of agricultural products and herb extracts primarily in China. The company's products include natural colors, including paprika oleoresin, marigold oleoresin, curcumin, red rice red, red cabbage, and red beet; and natural spice extracts and essential oils, such as capsicum oleoresin, zanthoxylum oil and oleoresin, black pepper oil and oleoresin, ginger oil and oleoresin, turmeric oil, star anise oil and oleoresin, cumin oil and oleoresin, garlic oil and oleoresin, and common fennel oil. It also provides nutritional products, such as lycopene, lutein, green coffee bean extract, grape seed extract, red yeast rice powder, capsaicin, ginkgo biloba extract, stevia, and astaxanthin; and oils and plant protein products, including refined cottonseed oil, cotton linter, cottonseed hull, cottonseed protein removed gossypol, and refined cottonseed protein powder. The company also exports its products to Europe, North and South America, Australia, Russia, Japan, Korea, India, and Southeast Asia. ChenGuang Biotech Group Co., Ltd. is based in Quzhou, China.

300143.SZ.summary: INKON Life Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells edible mushrooms in China and internationally. The company's products include fresh brown shimeji, white shimeji, needle, and king oyster mushrooms. It also engages in the development, production, sale, and maintenance of gamma ray stereotactic radiotherapy treatment system; construction and operation of radiation oncology treatment centers; and investments business. The company was formerly known as Starmap Medicine and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to INKON Life Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2019. INKON Life Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

300175.SZ.summary: Lontrue Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in agricultural industry in China and internationally. The company offers fresh fruits, nuts, seeds, dried fruits, packaged fruits, and OEM products. It serves food, IDC and logistics field industry. The company was formerly known as Yantai Guangyuan Fruit Vegetable Co., Ltd and changed its name to Lontrue Co., Ltd. in May 2009. Lontrue Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Longkou, China.

300313.SZ.long_name: Xinjiang Tianshan Animal Husbandry Bio-engineering Co., Ltd.
300313.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Tianshan Animal Husbandry Bio-engineering Co., Ltd. engages in cattle and sheep breeding activities in China. The company engages in the improvement of cattle and sheep varieties, relying on biological genetic technology to provide embryo and other genetic materials and related services for the livestock industry. It is also involved in breeding, fattening, slaughtering, processing, and selling beef cattle; and slaughtering beef and mutton products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Changji, China.

300498.SZ.summary: Wens Foodstuff Group Co., Ltd. operates as a livestock and poultry farming company in China. The company engages in the breeding and distribution of chickens and pigs, cows, meat ducks, deep sea fish, meat goats, and meat pigeons; and food processing, farming implement manufacturing, veterinary drug making, and fresh meat logistics activities. It also supplies eggs, raw milk and dairy products, and fresh and processed meat products. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Wens Foodstuff Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wens Foodstuff Group Co., Ltd. in August 2018. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Yunfu, China.

300511.SZ.summary: Shanghai Xuerong Biotechnology Co., Ltd., a bio-agricultural company, engages in the research, production, and marketing of edible fungi primarily in the People's Republic of China. It offers various mushroom products, such as white enoki, white-shimeji, brown-shimeji, seafood mushroom, king crab mushroom, king oyster mushroom, pleurotus nebrodensis, agaricus bisporus, and shiitake. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

300761.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Lihua Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd.
300761.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Lihua Animal Husbandry Co., Ltd. engages in the grass chicken farming in China. It is involved in the chicken, egg, goose, and food processing businesses. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

600095.SS.summary: Xiangcai Co., Ltd. engages in soybean deep processing, biochemical, real estate development, and new energy businesses in China and internationally. It offers protein isolates, tissue proteins, soy fibers, and soybean protein powders; and pharmaceuticals, including injections, tablets, capsules, granules, ointments, sprays, and other formulations of approximately 100 kinds of products for the treatment of anti-tumor, anti-burn, anti-cardiovascular, and cerebrovascular diseases. The company also engages in the solid preparation, liquid preparation, and genetic engineering activities. In addition, it provides waterproof materials, which are used in housing and mine construction, high-speed rail construction, hydropower stations and large-scale waste disposal site construction, and other waterproofing works; and develops solar power products. The company was formerly known as Harbin High-Tech (Group) Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Xiangcai Co., Ltd. in September 2020. Xiangcai Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Harbin, China.

600097.SS.short_name: SHANG HAI KAI CHUANG MARINE INT
600097.SS.long_name: Shanghai Kaichuang Marine International Co., Ltd.
600097.SS.summary: Shanghai Kaichuang Marine International Co., Ltd. engages in offshore fishing business in China and internationally. It also processes and sells aquatic products, such as yellowfin tuna and albacore tuna, as well as tuna fish fillets and related products. It also offers foods, including beans and meat, as well as produces other products. The company's fleet includes 3 trawl processing vessels and 10 tuna purse seine fishing vessels. Shanghai Kaichuang Marine International Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

600108.SS.summary: Gansu Yasheng Industrial (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, processing and sales of agricultural products in China. The company primarily produces and sells hops, potatoes, pastures, fruits, sunflowers, peppers, alfalfa, spices, beets, red dates, stevia, medicinal materials, and other water-saving irrigation materials. It engages in hop planting and management activities, as well as offers drip irrigation products, such as pipe, belt, PVC and PE pipe, etc. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Lanzhou, China.

600127.SS.summary: Jinjian Cereals Industry Co., Ltd. produces, processes, and sells grain and oil products in China. It offers rice, flour, noodles, vegetable oil, rice noodles, dairy products, candies, medicines, and other products. The company also primarily exports rice mill machines, tea seed meals, and organic fertilizers to Southeast Asia, Europe, the United States, the Middle East, Africa, Australia, etc. Jinjian Cereals Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Changde, China.

600257.SS.summary: Dahu Aquaculture Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides freshwater fishes in China. The company offers freshwater organic and glacial fish, Dahu organic turtles, and Jiangsu Yangcheng Lake hairy crabs; Xiangyunyu and Deshan wines; and other consumer products. It is also involved in water environment management activities; and developing and producing aquatic fingerlings. In addition, the company offers health food and health care products; cosmetics products; and pearl jewelry and ornaments. Further, it engages in industrial chain finance, pharmaceutical trade, and food processing businesses. Dahu Aquaculture Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Changde, China.

600313.SS.long_name: Zhongnongfa Seed Industry Group Co., Ltd.
600313.SS.summary: Zhongnongfa Seed Industry Group Co., Ltd. engages in the seed and agrochemical businesses in China. It offers wheat, rice, corn, cotton, rape, sesame, and sugar cane seeds; pesticides and fertilizers; and agricultural services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

600354.SS.short_name: GANSU DUNHUANG SEED GROUP CO LT
600354.SS.summary: Gansu Dunhuang Seed Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the seed, cotton, and food processing businesses in China. The company is involved in the selection, production, processing, and sale of crop seeds; sale of fertilizers and films; provision of agricultural, agricultural base construction, and agricultural management services; introduction, promotion, leasing, and sale of agricultural machinery and equipment; horticultural green design and construction activities; import and trade of crop seeds; and acquisition, processing, wholesale, and retail of agricultural and sideline products. It provides crop seeds, such as sugar beets, oilseeds, cotton, rice, wheat, corn, and other crop seeds, as well as fruits and flower seeds. The company also processes agricultural and sideline products, such as tomato sauce, tomato powder, dehydrated vegetables, and hops. In addition, it provides cotton temporary storage services; and designs, develops, produces, and sells plastic packaging products. The company also exports its products. Gansu Dunhuang Seed Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Jiuquan, China.

600359.SS.long_name: Xinjiang Talimu Agriculture Development Co., Ltd.
600359.SS.summary: Xinjiang Talimu Agriculture Development Co., Ltd. produces and sells various agricultural products in China. The company primarily offers long staple cotton, fine cashmere cotton, licorice series products, cotton pulp, viscose rayon, breeding stock, milk series products, crop and flower seedlings, and seed series products. It also provides upland cotton, color cotton, insect resistant cotton, rice, wheat, fruits, vegetables, flowers, nursery stock seeds, pesticides, fertilizers, and other products. The company also exports its products to the United States and Japan. Xinjiang Talimu Agriculture Development Co., Ltd. offers its products through distributors, agents, electricity suppliers, retailers, and pharmaceutical companies. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Aksu, China.

600371.SS.summary: WanXiang Doneed Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of hybrid corn seeds primarily in China. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Harbin, China.

600438.SS.summary: Tongwei Co., Ltd. produces and sells feed products in China and internationally. It offers aquatic feed products, including grass carp, crap, crucian, catfish, tilapia, bream, bigmouth, Jiang Tuan, sturgeon, and herring feed, as well as aquatic premix; livestock feed products, such as duck and chicken feed, pig food, and premix for poultry and pigs; aquatic seed products; and medicine products, including Chinese medicine, external disinfection, topical insecticides, and oral vitamins and antibiotics. The company also provides food products, such as fresh and frozen fish, meat, pig, and duck; and farming machinery comprising sow feeders, automatic separators, heat detectors, material towers, auger feed lines, plug trays, nursery and fattening feeders, quantitative buckets, and monomer feeders. In addition, it engages in the aquatic products research, aquaculture, animal health, food processing, and other activities. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Chengdu, China. Tongwei Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Tongwei Group Co., Ltd.

600467.SS.summary: Shandong Homey Aquatic Development Co.,Ltd. operates in marine food industry in China. The company offers sea cucumbers, oysters, kelps, shrimps, crabs, sea breams, abalones, prawns, clams, loach products, and other sea treasures. It also sells its products through approximately 300 retail chain stores and e-commerce platforms. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Rongcheng, China.

600506.SS.short_name: XIN JIANG KORLA PEAR CO. LTD.
600506.SS.summary: XinJiang Korla Pear Co.,Ltd engages in the development, cultivation, storage, warehousing, processing, and sale of agricultural products in China. It offers Korla fragrant pears, Turpan raisins, Xinjiang red dates, almonds, figs, other Xinjiang fruits, pear wines, and other products. The company sells its products under the Oriental fruit, Shayidong, and Oriental Shengguo brand names. XinJiang Korla Pear Co.,Ltd is based in Korla, China.

600540.SS.long_name: Xinjiang Sayram Modern Agriculture Co., Ltd
600540.SS.summary: Xinjiang Sayram Modern Agriculture Co., Ltd engages in the cultivation of cotton, and processing and refining of edible oil in China. The company produces sunflower seed, safflower seed, tomato seed, grape seed, rapeseed, soybean, cotton seed, and other edible oils, as well as cotton yarn. It is also involved in coal mining, wind power generation, and construction activities. The company is based in Bole, China.

600598.SS.summary: Heilongjiang Agriculture Company Limited produces and sells agricultural products. The company offers rice, corn, and other food crops; and operates a contracted farmland. It also offers technology services related to crop production; retails fertilizers; and develops and sells real estate properties. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Harbin, China.

600975.SS.summary: Hunan New Wellful Co.,Ltd. primarily engages in the breeding and supplying of pigs. It is also involved in feed, raw material trade, slaughter, cold chain logistics, pig trading, cold meat processing and sale, and breeding equipment businesses. The company offers its products under the U fresh and Chenfeng brand names in China, Hong Kong, and Macau. Hunan New Wellful Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

601952.SS.long_name: Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural Reclamation and Development Co.,Ltd.
601952.SS.summary: Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural Reclamation and Development Co.,Ltd., an agricultural company, researches, develops, produces, processes, manages, and sells commodity grain and seeds in China. It is also involved in cultivation and production of rice. In addition, the company produces and sells fertilizers, pesticides, enzymes, bio-fertilizer products, and other biological products, as well as offers agricultural resources services to rural areas. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Nanjing, China. Jiangsu Provincial Agricultural Reclamation and Development Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiangsu Nongken Group Co.,Ltd.

603363.SS.long_name: Fujian Aonong Biological Technology Group Incorporation Limited
603363.SS.summary: Fujian Aonong Biological Technology Group Incorporation Limited engages in the feed, animal protection, pig raising, raw materials trade, agricultural Internet, and other businesses in China and internationally. The company offers nutrition products; professional pig services; probiotics, such as bacillus, lactic acid bacteria, and yeast; and various mixed feed additives and liquid multi-dimensional additives. It also provides vaccines, veterinary drug preparations, micro ecological preparations, powders, premixes, oral liquids, and disinfectants, as well as terminally sterilized and sterilized non-intravenous. In addition, the company offers professional management systems, and information and trading platforms; and information solutions and services for the daily management of downstream pig farms, as well as support services to downstream customers. Further, it operates in breeding and insurance industries. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Xiamen, China.

603609.SS.long_name: Liaoning Wellhope Agri-Tech Joint Stock Co., Ltd.
603609.SS.summary: Liaoning Wellhope Agri-Tech Joint Stock Co., Ltd. produces and sells feed products for swine, poultry, ruminant animals, aquaculture, and fur-farmed animals in China. The company is also involved in trading of fish meal, meat and bone meal, soybean meal, cottonseed meal, rapeseed meal, and corn and its by-products, as well as feed additives, such as vitamins and enzymic preparations, amino acids, antioxidants, mould inhibitors, probiotics, mildew agents, acidifying agents, sweeteners, and disinfectants; and animal medicines, including antimicrobials, antiparasitic agents, antiviral drugs, and health care products. It also engages in the hatchery, broiler raising, slaughtering, and meat processing; manufacturing bio-tech, farm, and feed and livestock equipment; producing food products; and producing and selling and feeds and raw materials under the Wellhope brand name. In addition, the company provides medical and health care services for pet. The company exports its products to Spain, Norway, Nepal, Mongolia, Russia, Japan, Mexico, New Zealand, South Africa, Ethiopia, etc. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

603668.SS.long_name: Fujian Tianma Science and Technology Group Co., Ltd
603668.SS.summary: Fujian Tianma Science and Technology Group Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells aquatic feed in China. It offers seedling and special aquatic products, such as grouper, squid, scorpion, scorpion, turtle, large yellow croaker, and California scorpion feeds. The company also provides powdered, marine fish, freshwater variety, shrimp, and seedling compound feeds. Fujian Tianma Science and Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Fuqing, China.

7OM.F.summary: China Shengmu Organic Milk Limited, an investment holding company, produces and distributes raw milk and dairy products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Bayannur, the People's Republic of China.

ADVV.summary: Adveco Group, Inc., through its subsidiaries, grows and sells various agricultural products in the People's Republic of China. It grows various types of fruits, such as grapes, strawberries, sand pears, kiwi, peach, mulberries, alfalfa, citrus, and bayberries; and vegetables comprising tomatoes, cucumbers, small pumpkins, eggplants, cabbage, spinach, leeks, peppers, bitter gourd, and loofah. The company also operates a rice plantation with an area of approximately 3,335,000 square meters in Mahe and Guishan; and provides organic and processed food products, as well as distributes local food products. In addition, it offers pork products, including pork loins, pork ribs, pork tails, and many others under the Running Piglet brand name; and operates a country themed restaurant that provides home-cooked Chinese meals. The company primarily sells its products through the Internet and mobile devices. Adveco Group, Inc. is headquartered in Jingmen, the People's Republic of China.

BIQIF.summary: BIQI International Holding Corporation engages in the energy, health, and other investment activities. The company was formerly known as Renmin Tianli Group, Inc. and changed its name to BIQI International Holding Corporation in January 2019. BIQI International Holding Corporation was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

CATN.summary: CAT9 Group Inc. engages in the marketing and sale of fresh fruits, vegetables, and meats primarily in the People's Republic of China. It also involved in the acquisition of land for the planting of acer truncatum trees and harvesting of seeds to produce edible oil; farm management activities; and sale of farm machinery. The company was formerly known as ANDES 4 Inc. CAT9 Group Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

HERB.summary: YaSheng Group, through its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets farming and sideline products; chemical materials and products; textiles; construction materials; and livestock and poultry products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It cultivates, processes, markets, and distributes various food and agro-byproducts. The company's products include cotton, corns, barley, wheat, flax, and alfalfa; vegetables comprising onions, potatoes, beet, and peas; fruits, including apples, pears, and apricots; specialty crops consisting of hops, wolfberries, cumin, hemp, and liquorices; seeds, such as black melon, sunflower, corn, hemp, and flax seeds; and eggs. It also provides construction materials, such as cement; and designs, develops, and markets new technologies related to agriculture and genetic biology. The company sells its products to food processors, supermarkets, and wholesale stores through distributors, as well as to direct customers. YaSheng Group exports its products. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Lanzhou, the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2015, YaSheng Group is a subsidiary of Gansu Yasheng Salt Chemical Industrial Group, Ltd.

LUCC.summary: Luca, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, produces, processes, markets, and distributes organic and other agricultural products made from corn and grains in Shanxi province, the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Corn, Grain, and Bulk Trading divisions. It provides corn and corn byproducts. The company also offers packaged and unpackaged grains, including millet, soy bean, green bean, black rice, wheat, etc.; simple processed grain products packaged under Deyu and Shitie trademarks; bean based products under the Huichun brand name, including vegetarian products and instant noodles made from soybeans, black beans, and green beans; and fruit vinegars and juices under the Longquan Villa brand. In addition, it is also involved in the procurement, trading, and wholesale of rice, flour, wheat, kidney beans, green beans, and other agricultural products. The company serves livestock feed companies, food manufacturers, corn oil/corn starch manufacturing companies, grain trading companies, wholesalers, distributors, institutional clients, governmental procurement agencies, and retail stores. The company was formerly known as Deyu Agriculture Corp. and changed its name to Luca, Inc. in January 2016. Luca, Inc. is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Luca, Inc. is a subsidiary of Expert Venture Ltd.

MLGDI.PA.long_name: Guandao Puer Investment Co., Ltd S.A.
MLGDI.PA.summary: Guandao Puer Investment Co., Ltd S.A., an investments holding company, trades in tea related goods. It also operates approximately 30 stores under the Guandao Shanshe name in China, as well as sells its products through online platform. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Kunming, China.

OGAA.summary: Organic Agricultural Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, processes and sells food products in the People's Republic of China. It sells paddy and selenium-enriched paddy products, rice, and other agricultural products. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

PME.summary: Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd., through its subsidiary, Fujian Provincial Pingtan County Ocean Fishing Group Co., Ltd., engages in the ocean fishing business. The company catches a range of fish species, such as squid, ribbon fish, croaker fish, and cuttlefish. As of December 31, 2019, it owned 41 squid jigging vessels, 26 trawlers, 25 seine vessels, 13 drifters, 4 longline fishing vessels, and 2 transport vessels, as well as had operating license rights to 20 drifters. The company serves various customers, including distributors, restaurant owners, and exporters in the People's Republic of China. Pingtan Marine Enterprise Ltd. has strategic cooperation agreements with World Telecom Satellite Technology Limited and Wuhan Incar Technology Limited to explore the construction of PME-Live, a high-speed information platform for pelagic fishing vessels, as well as establish PME-Track, an aquatic products production, supply, and marketing tracking management platform. The company is based in Fuzhou, the People's Republic of China.

S1N.SG.summary: Sunwin Stevia International, Inc. produces and sells natural sweeteners and other pharmaceutical products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates through two segments, Stevioside; and Corporate and Other Pharmaceutical. The company produces and sells various steviol glycosides with rebaudioside A and stevioside as the principal components. It provides Steviosin, a low calorie stevia extract for medicinal use; and OnlySweet, a zero calorie tabletop sweetener to food and drug manufacturers, and ingredient distributor foreign trade companies. The company also produces and sells Metformin, a medication for the treatment of type 2 diabetes. Sunwin Stevia International, Inc. is based in Qufu, China.

SIAF.summary: Sino Agro Food, Inc. operates as an agriculture technology and natural food holding company in the People Republic of China. The company's products include live prawns, live eels, whole beef cattle, and packaged beef meat. It is also involved in the bulk and concentrated livestock feed producing and manufacturing; production of organic fertilizers; distribution of beef meat; and technology engineering consulting and services. The company was formerly known as A Power Agro Agriculture Development, Inc. and changed its name to Sino Agro Food, Inc. in December 2007. Sino Agro Food, Inc. is headquartered in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

SUWN.summary: Sunwin Stevia International, Inc. produces and sells natural sweeteners and other pharmaceutical products primarily in the People's Republic of China. It operates through two segments, Stevioside; and Corporate and Other Pharmaceutical. The company produces and sells various steviol glycosides with rebaudioside A and stevioside as the principal components. It provides Steviosin, a low calorie stevia extract for medicinal use; and OnlySweet, a zero calorie tabletop sweetener to food and drug manufacturers, and ingredient distributor foreign trade companies. The company also produces and sells Metformin, a medication for the treatment of type 2 diabetes. Sunwin Stevia International, Inc. is based in Qufu, China.

YS0.F.summary: YuanShengTai Dairy Farm Limited, a dairy farming company, engages in the production and sale of raw milk in the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2019, it had six farms in Heilongjiang Province and one farm in Jilin Province with a total of 63,640 cows. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Qiqihar, the People's Republic of China.
